text: Va az nisonahoi dalolatkunanda ʙar ʙuzurgii qudrati U on ast, ki ʙodhoi muƶdadihandaro mefiristad, to rahmati Xudro ʙa sumo, ki hamono ʙoron, farovoni, sarsaʙzj ast, ʙirasonad va to kistiho ʙa farmoni U ravon ʙosand va az fazli U ruzi ʙicued. Bosad, ki sukr gued va Uro ʙa jagonagi parastis kuned
